subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal was distressed by Wimbledon’s tumultuous weather and traditional ways after Day 1 of a third-round odyssey against Robin Soderling that will continue into a fifth day Wednesday.
snippet: Rafael Nadal was distressed by Wimbledon’s tumultuous weather and traditional ways after Day 1 of a third-round odyssey against Robin Soderling that will continue into a fifth day Wednesday.
